E-CARD PREVIEW:

Criteria: Technical Excellence

I would like to thank each of you for your outstanding contributions to helping us attain an on-time launch of project Narwhal. The downstream impact of delivering our new product set is competitively invaluable and key to supporting us and our partners' success in the marketplace. You guys embody our values and have delivered along every step of the way.

Anna Parker
Award Date: 10/19/2015
